text: to (ai rasool) agar khuda tum in munaapheqeen ke kisee giroh kee taraph (jihaad se saheesaalim) vaapas lae phir tumase (jihaad ke vaaste) nikalane kee ijaazat maangen to tum saaf kah do ki tum mere saath (jihaad ke vaaste) haragiz na nikalane paoge aur na haragiz dushman se mere saath ladane paoge jab tumane pahalee marataba (ghar mein) baithe rahana pasand kiya to (ab bhee) peechhe rah jaane vaalon ke saath (ghar mein) baithe raho
